body:
Comment 27 by **nfa106**: 
This is my workaround, so now I can try to do some productive with Go :), I'll just need
to remember to run it when I update from hg.

#!/bin/bash

CMDS_ROOT=$HOME/go/src/cmd
GO_CMDS=( 'cgo' 'ebnflint' 'godoc' 'gofix' 'gofmt' 'goinstall' 'gotest' 'gotype' 'govet'
'goyacc' 'hgpatch')

for cmd in ${GO_CMDS[@]}
do
        echo "Fixing ${cmd} for ARM."
        cd ${CMDS_ROOT}/${cmd}
        make
        make install
done
